Description:
Close To Bowls & Golf
This 3 bedroom brick home, is located in a quiet court, within easy walk of the golf club, bowls club and local park. Refurbished lounge with gas heating and views to the hills. Spacious eat-in kitchen with electric cooking, plus family room that adjoins the covered outdoor eating area. Central bathroom. Outside is a double length drive-through carport, single garage, and established native gardens. A great place to get away from it all.
Insights: 8 Cameo court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
BIG HOME AND BLOCK (APPROX. 700 SQM) SO AFFORDABLE! OWNER SAYS SELL!
A real haven with a tree lined area giving privacy in a big home and block. Tri level home with north facing loungeroom, separate meals and kitchen with doors opening to undercover decking, a rumpus room on lower level opening to backyard, another separate family room on the upper floor, this is great for entertaining with balcony overlooking the treetops and bushland. Three bedrooms, all have BIR's., two bathrooms, laundry and separate toilets. Features include pantry, loads of storage, 2 split systems, central heating, gas heater and store room. Side drive to double garage. Just adding your touch to this great design will make this a real winner. This is the chance to buy very well now before the owner rents.
Insights: 14 Dederang Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle Elegance
A property of distinction, Set on over 5000sqm this beautifully presented home offers a the new owners an opportunity to enjoy the benefits of a well established executive home built to the highest standards. features include a 5 Kw solar power system, solar hot water service, gas ducted central heating, and open fireplace and 2 reverse cycle air conditioners to keep the home comfortable all year round.
The elevated position affords outstanding panoramic views over Corio Bay and beyond.
other Features include a full size tennis court, an in ground solar heated pool, separate workshop Garage and expansive under house cellar and an established fruit orchard. Make the move and enjoy all the the Bellarine has to offer including award winning wineries, restaurants and olive groves and only 90 minutes Melbourne, 25 minutes Geelong and 10 minutes from some of Australia's best surf beaches.
Insights: 13 Cameron Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautiful family home ideally located.
From the moment you walk through the double front doors - you feel welcomed home in this delightful living space.
A modern, two storey family home with nothing to do but settle in and enjoy the lifestyle, positioned in a tranquil court setting just moments from the Golf course and short walk to the foreshore; here on the Bellarine.
This well designed home provides a sense of space and light in it's functionality and appealing layout. Three separate living zones - starting with the front formal lounge, walk along the wide hallway that opens to the expansive second lounge, bright kitchen and dining; all overlooking a covered entertaining area and northeast facing private garden. Upstairs opens to a further lounge or kids own zone, complete with four bedrooms. Master bedroom at the front has it's own private balcony, WIR and spacious ensuite. Three more bedrooms all with BIR's are located overlooking the pretty back garden and close to the main bathroom.
This home also features gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, a double garage with direct access to the home, a well designed vegetable garden and quality kitchen appliances.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED WITH BAY VIEWS AND A STROLL TO THE WATERS EDGE.
Villa 2 has street frontage and overlooks hole 13 of the Golf Club, your own green, this provides a haven and a unique position on the Bellarine. The owner has added some magic when renovating, the new kitchen is excellent, light and bright, plenty of room to entertain with ease, continues to the dining and lounge area, all overlooking the decking and view. Two bedrooms, 2 way bathroom, laundry nook and outside therapy room or home office, many options. Features; pantry, split system, fans, new floor coverings, new window furnishings, new fence as well as great use of subtle colours to enhance the home. Carport, landscaped gardens, vegie patch and corner shops just around the corner. Be surprised with this great opportunity to buy well in a prime position.

Description:
Brings Back Memories!
A grand entrance boasting 10 foot ceilings, polished floorboards and ornate timber windows frames featuring led lights sets the theme for this former beauty!! 3 spacious bedrooms are complimented by 2 separate living areas and a kitchen meals area. The formal lounge with high ceilings, polished floorboards and an ornamental fire place steps directly onto a rear decking area which takes in glimpses of bay/water views. A separate casual lounge is currently used as a sitting area/library. A modernised kitchen/meals area catches more glimpses of the bay. The bathroom is a generous space but certainly put its hand up for some renovation and 'work'! We cannot escape the fact this charming weatherboard with Californian Bungalow influences requires some 'roll up your sleeves hard work' but it offers a great opportunity for the savvy property speculator.
Insights: 6 Gumarooka Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLISH HOME, WELL MAINTAINED OVER THE YEARS AND IT SPARKLES LIKE NEW.
Nothing to do but unpack and enjoy No. 18, a light filled home includes gracious entry with generous lounge room, another area combines second living, dining and well equipped kitchen, flexible floorplan can suit the needs of the new owner. Three bedrooms, the master with WIR, others have BIR's, study, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include fan forced wood fire, gas heater, floor heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vac. water tank, two sheds, pantry, dishwasher and so much storage. Outside undercover entertaining space set amongst the matured garden. Secured double enclosed carport (more like a garage) allows for more than two cars. This home has to be inspected to appreciate the quality and strength of this great home.

Description:
A BEAUTIFUL PEACEFUL HAVEN, COURT POSITION, SOLAR PANELS AND RENOVATED!
This home exudes warmth, style and colour... a great home close to the village, jetty, Golf Club and schools. Open plan area including dining, living and gleaming new kitchen, this room has big hardwood doors opening to verandah and undercover patio. Another large room can be used for rumpus or second living, also can be closed off with French doors for that quiet space. Three double bedrooms all with BIR's, extra-large bathroom and laundry. Features include fabulous high timber ceilings, 2 split systems, gas ducted heating, open fireplace, 4 fans, plantation shutters, claw foot bath, quality fittings and so much more to appreciate. The matured garden has fernery and lawn area. Side drive with carport, plenty of room for more vehicles. Do not hesitate to view it is a wonderful home.
Insights: 8 Boondi Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Make the Sea Change and enjoy the Lifestyle
This well presented renovated home will impress the first home buyer or investor. The property boasts 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The lounge area is spacious with views of Corio Bay and beyond. The kitchen is outstanding with its Ash timber bench top and stainless appliances. The dining room opens out to a delightful undercover alfresco area that features a raised timber deck with attractive bamboo paneling. The front and rear gardens are tastefully landscaped and low maintenance. The wide sealed driveway gives good access to the rear yard and workshop shed and there is plenty of room for a boat and caravan to be parked. Other features include electronically controlled modern security shutters to all windows and inbuilt alarm system for peace of mind. With public transport nearby, close to schools and shops and only a short walk to the Clifton springs beach.
Insights: 16 Tarpeena Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat As A New Pin!
The Vendor of this lovely property have decided that it must be sold and will consider all reasonable offers! Excellent presentation- 3 bedrooms. Already offering some good views of the bay but if you were to build up you would have a stunning panorama to enjoy. Recently painted internally with new carpets this property is ready to be enjoyed. Formal lounge with adjoining dining or family room plus well appointed timber kitchen and meals area. All bedrooms have robes and master a full ensuite. Tidy well established garden and double carport. Gas heating & split system air conditioning keep the home comfortable all year round. Call me to arrange a time to inspect.

Description:
JUST FANTASTIC, BIG BAY VIEWS, NEW HOUSE (18 MTHS) AND PERFECT.
Why build when you can have this stylish new home right now, No. 100 has loads of class, the design and quality of all fixtures and fittings is excellent, neutral tonings have been chosen to suit the flexible floorplan and garden has been landscaped. Downstairs has wide entrance, a living area with doors opening to outside patio, two double bedrooms with BIR's, central bathroom, laundry and another room which is currently used as a formal sitting room, has WIR and ensuite, ideally the fourth bedroom if needed. The wide staircase leads to the open plan living space which combines generous living, dining and great kitchen all overlooking the bay, enjoy Geelong by night.... glorious, the spacious main bedroom has big WIR and ensuite, powder room also on this level. Features plantation blinds, central heating, split system, dishwasher, ducted vac., stone benches, s.s. appliances. walk in pantry, BBQ gas outlets and so much more. Dual access with double garage, side access to rear, allowing for caravan and or boat. Close to the Golf Club, the jetty and the Dell....enjoy living in bliss on the beautiful Bellarine.
Insights: 100 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 157 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Toto, I've A Feeling We're Not In 'A New Estate' Anymore!
Calling all buyers wanting a generous family home packed with character, charm and warmth. Boasting 5 bedrooms - master with ensuite. A delightful and spacious country style kitchen/meals is complimented by the 'mod cons' including dishwasher and 800mm upright gas cooker. The adjoining family room complete with cathedral ceilings, timber floors and recycled timber feature wall is bathed in natural light. French doors offer a lovely connection to a north facing decked entertaining area which looks made for an early coffee and a late glass of wine. A separate sunken lounge/library offers a further relaxed living zone for the growing family. A double garage and off street parking for a boat etc.
Insights: 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A GARDEN HAVEN TO ENHANCE A VERY AFFORDABLE HOME
Formal lounge and dining with second living including kitchen providing a space for flexible use and opening to a leafy and matured garden. Master bedroom has ensuite and all three bedrooms have BIR's, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Includes new oven and hotplates, electric heating, great natural light, garage, carport and side drive. This roomy home has the proportions to live in now and just add your touch in time. The position is great, schools, jetty, golf club all closeby. Ring for an inspection.

Description:
A Little Ripper!
This 3 bedroom property is set on a generous 594m2 allotment and is just minutes to transport, golf course and boat ramp. Fresh and neat the homes has new carpets through-out. The kitchen & meals area overlooks a tidy rear yard which offers plenty of space for the children to run & play. A light & sunny lounge room is located at the front of the home. Gas and solid fuel heaters keep the home warm in winter and an air conditioner maintains your summer comfort. A carport complete with roller door takes care of the car. Currently leased until July next year to an excellent tenant.

Description:
PRIVATE OASIS IN A TREED SETTING
In this day and age of small compact houses this vendor was certainly ahead of her time.
Making sure the trees were left on the land the house was positioned so that it was well shaded and the now the birds just love it. No wasted space here but at the same time spacious. In the vendors own words "I can sit on my couch and look out either door and invite the outside in. It is very relaxing" Although it may need you to add your own touches what you start with is neat and compact. Extending the home is always an option too. Clifton Springs is a vibrant community where you can enjoy a lifestyle of work, rest and play. All amenities needed are all close at hand. The necessities such as supermarkets, the fun stuff such as riding, walking tracks, the sporting groups & restaurants.
Insights: 49 Whitcombes Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
FOR THE GROWING FAMILY
Situated on a 630m2 block in a quiet street in the heart of Clifton Springs lies this three bedroom, two bathroom beauty. Upon entering you'll notice the first of the two interior living areas, with brand new carpet recently laid and the master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and ensuite. Also boasting a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and 'Chef' gas cooktop and rangehood; opening to the open-plan dining area and a second living area at the back of the home. All three bedrooms are generously proportioned, and the home also includes a fantastic outdoor entertaining area and drive-through garage.

Description:
A QUALITY HOME, PRIME COURT POSITION, SOLAR, 5 MINUTE WALK TO THE BAY.
A splendid home on approx. 700 SQM with so much to offer the new owner, No. 12 has that extra special appeal. Well maintained with a garden haven creating lots of privacy and leafy views from inside, a separate back garden with vegie patch and fruit trees, garden to table. Wide entrance, separate lounge and formal dining, second large open plan area which includes informal meals, fantastic fully renovated gourmet kitchen with so many extras, generous sitting space with lots of light and doors opening to the gardens. Three bedrooms, master with WIR and 2 way ensuite with separate toilet/powder room, remaining two have BIR's, study, central bathroom, laundry and second separate toilet. Features include four door pantry, dishwasher, split system, central heating, 4 tanks, fans, quality window furnishings, plenty of storage and more. Triple garage with tandem and plenty of room for the caravan/boat. Ring for a private inspection, the Bellarine is the place to be.
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Great location, Great Value!
Stylish 4 bedroom home in the fast growing bay side community of Clifton Springs. Whether you're looking for a coastal get away, fresh start or investment this property offers it all. Modern tones lead you through this well equipped home offering you generous sized bedrooms all with BIR's, master bedroom with WIR & ensuite. The heart of the home is the huge open plan kitchen/ living & dining complete with stainless steel appliances perfect for family gatherings or entertaining. To finish off this rewarding home is central heating, split system a/c, security system, double garage & a blank canvas backyard ready to make your very own desired oasis. Minutes to the brand new Curlewis shopping complex near completion, Drysdale shopping and the stunning coast line this property truly is best value for money! Inspection is a must

Description:
Little Gem for First Home Buyers
Well loved and in a picturesque position close to the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp. This quaint three bedroom, one bathroom brick veneer home has potential to extend upstairs to capture the expansive views.
Located in a quiet, well-established street close to public transport, schools and recreational facilities.
The living area has a northerly aspect and is surrounded by wrap around decking for outdoor entertaining. The enclosed veranda makes a lovely sun room for sitting and relaxing. There is access to outdoors from the main bedroom and study which gives a pleasant open feel to these rooms.
Double car garage with men's shed or workshop with power and concrete floors approximately 14m x 6.5m. Inspection by appointment only.
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 14 Kanyanya Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Jackpot!!! Modern Family Home, X3 Living Areas And BIG Views!!
This contemporary family home should be on everyone must see list! Boasting 3 generous bedrooms (master complete with ensuite), 3 separate living areas for the growing family, quality fixtures/fittings and an exceptional north facing entertaining area to capture BIG bay views!! The kitchen/family/meals area is bathed in natural light. An adjoining rumpus room is more than generous and could be used as a theatre room etc. The separate 3rd living area gives the floor plan even further flexibility. A double garage, off street parking and potential side access is more than adequate for the car, boat or the caravan! With all the modern comforts this family home simply has it all!!
